storyInfo: Seeing the youths in front of her puts a smile on Signora Sicilia's face.

attributes.content: Didn't the Signori dei Lupi agree not to meddle in the affairs of mortals?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I changed my mind. Bernardo ruined my plans!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: I spent sixty-eight years grooming him.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: And now he's killed himself just to deny my victory!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Wh-What did you say?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: My father... killed himself?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: His father's interpretation of the Signori dei Lupi and the game flash through Leontuzzo's mind.
He suddenly understands that the words his father spoke to him in the church were a kind of approval for him...
And his last words.
His father had planned to take his own life all along.
The price for insulting the Signori dei Lupi is a heavy one.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: He may dead, but I won't stop until his bloodline is ended.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Son of Bernardo, you will pay for the sins of your father!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: The price is his bloodline and your life!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Price?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Did you say 'price?'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: My father may have been wrong, but his dream was always about bringing change to the times.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He wanted a Siracusa without the famiglie, and spent his entire life planning it.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I thought his own family was a chip to him.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I thought he acted when he did because it was the right time.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But now I know.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He decided he was out of time. This was his only chance to get revenge on you and achieve his dream.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I taught him everything he knew! He repaid me with betrayal!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: You wouldn't understand.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Signore dei Lupi on high, thinking everything under his control.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: To father, even his own life was just another chip.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He was determined to make his dream come true, even if it meant paying the ultimate price.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But you're the one who will pay!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Ignorant whelp!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Welcome back, Texas!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Are you done over there?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Time to clean up the trouble over here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The last Texas.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Do not forget who permitted you to break from Siracusa.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: How dare you defy me?!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: I kept my bargain with Bernardo. I owe you nothing.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Fool!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Bernardo killed himself?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The game is over, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: So that's what you really meant...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A Siracusa without the famiglie. That was your true dream.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why didn't you tell me?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Try to keep your head in the fight, Judgie.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why didn't you tell me you were throwing a party, Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You would've come anyway.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah, you're right.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Get lost, cub without a pack. There's no place for you here.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Let me tell you some good news, Signore dei Lupi, Figlio dei Lupi, whatever you are.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Starting now, everything Siracusan is my enemy.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Even supernatural beings like you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Idiot!
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: What about you, boss? If you were there, looking me in the eye, would you tell me without a doubt, that you choose your dreams, like Leon?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I mean... I don't know the answer anymore.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Stay focused, if you don't want to die.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You're—
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The feeble Fang of Agnese.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Did you think yourself worthy to stand before me just because you caught a glimpse of the death of my Fang?
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: I promised Bernardo that I'd help his kin.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Agnese has raised a feeble Fang.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: It's time to put an end to her part in this game.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: You cannot destroy me, no matter what you do.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: You cannot even harm me.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Humans built cities, trapped themselves within, and think themselves the masters of the lands beneath them.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Do not presume to have risen because you learned to use a few tools.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: You have never conquered the wastes.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Ladies and gentleman.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You stand in the presence of the Emperor, Lungmen's superstar!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Boss?!
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Lemme take this chance to remind you your vacation's almost up, Texas.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Why are you here?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You askin' me?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sora and the girls ran off after you.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You know what the past month's been like for me?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I ain't been this bored in three thousand years!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I got nobody to party with!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Emperor—
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Hold it, Zaaro.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You gonna say I got no business in Siracusa. It ain't my right to stick my flipper in here.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Honestly, I don't give a shit.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: But, if I think on it, I'm gonna pass on some dumbass fight with you...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Beatin' you at your own game, that'd make me happier.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: So—
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Shadow after shadow emerges from beneath Emperor's feet and takes corporeal form.
Zaaro knows them, of course. They are the Signori dei Lupi who have lost in this round.
They are here for one reason.
He broke the rules.
They can accept how he played, but they will not permit the rules to be broken.
Look, I brought the other Wolf Lords. They bored too.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Lemme give you the good news.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You're a loser.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: In pretty much every way a man can be a loser.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: The Signori dei Lupi are immortal, but over the long years, they have long learned how to contain, suppress, even torment each other.
Against so many beings of his kind, Zaaro knows that resistance is futile.
After a moment of silence, he lowers his proud head.
Tell ya the truth, Zaaro?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Your whole thing, the way you talk about power, the way you play with it, gives me the heebie-jeebies.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: The way you stew in your anger, lookin' to tear everything in your way to pieces...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: That's what shows you still true to your nature.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: But all you wolves, don't you get bored playin' a dumbass game like this for thousands of years?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You oughta come to Lungmen. I'll teach ya to play poker.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Or mahjong. Mahjong ain't bad.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Zaaro ignores Emperor's jabs.
He takes one last, long look at Leontuzzo, then his silhouette becomes less and less distinct, until he fades away completely in the wind.
It is as though he never existed.
Thanks, Boss.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Don't thank me.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Someone woulda done somethin', even if it wasn't me.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: She just delegated the job. Didn't ya, sexy?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: It's been a long time since anyone called me 'sexy.'
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: You're welcome to spend some time enjoying Siracusa, if you like.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Just call me Emperor.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Interesting name. You're not arrogant or ignorant, like the Signori dei Lupi, Siracusa welcomes you, Emperor.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I think Siracusa's gonna like me.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Signora Sicilia!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The games of the Signori dei Lupi are archaic and stupid.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Leontuzzo, son of Bernardo.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Rest assured, he'll never trouble you again.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Leontuzzo cannot move an inch.
He realizes that everything ended the moment the old woman appeared.
Not just the game of the Signori dei Lupi, but their resistance as well.
The old woman before him looks kind and cordial, but he knows that he will die in the most painful way possible, if he makes one wrong move.
He also knows, however, that to back down now is to see all his effort, all that he believes in, fade into dream.
He looks over at Lavinia and sees the same thought in her eyes.
Pardon me, Signora Sicilia. I didn't expect to have the honor of your presence in this way.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You may already know what happened. You may already have made your decision.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But I hope you'll give me and Lavinia a chance.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: A chance. What kind of chance?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: A chance to talk.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Even if we're doomed to die, I hope you'll grant us an audience before that happens.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Agenir always says I should listen to the youths more.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I think he overestimates his age.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Come with me, children. You have earned the chance.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: May I have a moment first?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I would like to take one last look at Bernardo.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Exusiai! Texas!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You okay?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We're fine.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I was too worried. Giovanna's stable now, so I brought Croissant.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Looks like everything's more-or-less hunky-dory over here, though?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I guess so.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Whew... it still feels like something's missing, but I guess we can throw our party now?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You guys decide what kind of party you want.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Where are you going, Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Toilet.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Toilet isn't that way.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Feel a weight off your shoulders? Like you just got over a hill?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: There's still big trouble waiting, right there.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ha. Shall we go?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We'll go.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: By the way, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I got a letter from Signora Sicilia before you went back to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Cool.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Guess what it said?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No thanks.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, you're no fun. Signora Sicilia invited me to join the Bocca al Lupo.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Bocca al Lupo...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Basically, become one of her wolves.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So I burned the letter.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I figured I was gonna get some Siracusans giving me trouble for a while.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Then you went back to Siracusa, all of a sudden.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Do you have any idea how surprised I was when I realized you were gone?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So you've made up your mind?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll stay and help Lavinia and Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've made up my mind too.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I heard you made a hell of a scene with your own famiglia.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I just went to say goodbye to my father.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas... Do you really not get what I see in you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Sometimes I think I do.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sometimes I think I don't.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: All I know is that you seem to have gotten over something.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh? Are you showing concern for me?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I just think you're kind of annoying.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The pair were walking side-by-side, but now they head to opposite ends of the clearing, as if by some silent agreement.
At the end of the day, we have to do this.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I guess so.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Do you remember?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Seven years ago, you came to me, in front of the burning mansion, looking to get away from it all.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I got hell for it that day.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Seven years later, you came to me again, in a rainy park, to issue a silly challenge to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'll kill you today.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That's my line.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The sound of weapons clashing fills the park.
No tricks, no fooling around. Every attack is intended to kill.
You could call me your past, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I believed that no one could escape this swamp.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You escaped your past, once, and made up your mind to cut all ties with it, after returning to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You proved to everyone that you had what it took to escape the swamp.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're staying here of your own accord, to help that young cub change the place.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're giving me too much credit.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: My dream has always been to live a simple life with a few good friends.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll defend it, if someone threatens to destroy it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: There's nothing complicated about it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I never truly knew you, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I didn't realize how Siracusa exhausted you, or how you resented Columbia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, I was like my grandma.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: She spent her entire life hoping that old Salvadore would change his mind.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But she never even asked, never tried to fight for it.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The same for me. I assumed the good times would last forever.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I was so proud, and arrogant.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You wouldn't mind me staying with you, and I would love to chat more with Sora.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But I don't deserve that. Not yet.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: And so, let me close the curtains on Act 3 of La Morte di Texas, on Cellinia Texas's story.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You're free, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: No one defines you.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: So let me put it a different way.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're my nightmare, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You always surprise me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're always a step ahead of me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You made all the decisions that I couldn't.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And now I can finally say this, after finally taking that step, like you did.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: There's nothing complicated about it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If I hated everything about Siracusa so much, I should've destroyed it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: In the end, you're the one who made me take this step.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That's why you said goodbye to your father, and why you're standing here in front of me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You want to settle things with your past.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yes. Just like you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We didn't have to go at each other's throats like this.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But it happened.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We each decided, on our own, that to kill each other is the way to settle things.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The best way to say our goodbyes.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The one who survives will become stronger.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Not that Lappland has become stronger than Texas, or that Texas has become weak.
Just like how Lappland did not lose to Texas seven years ago because she was weaker.
They were evenly matched from the beginning.
What determines the outcome is Lady Luck, perhaps... or more importantly, strength of will.
Seven years ago, Lappland lost the battle of wills.
But now, having said goodbye to the famiglia, her will is no weaker than Texas's.
Either may win, and either may lose.
Ugh...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's over.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Stay back.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas takes one look at Sora, then closes her eyes.
Lappland thought she knew Texas well enough.
What did she not know?
She bore witness to Texas's exhaustion with Siracusa, and her decision to declare war on the country.
Texas's decisions surprised her each time.
But this time, she thought, it would not be so.
One lives, the other dies. There would be no other end.
But as she saw the unwillingness to let go in Texas's eyes, she once again realized that she was wrong.
At the very end, in the ending that Lappland wrote for herself, Texas has surprised her, once again.
Ha. Alright.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland sees this battle as a farewell, a liberation.
Lose, and she will accept her death.
Win, and she will be able to let it all go.
When the pin by the name of Texas is pulled from her consciousness, a lunatic by the name of Lappland would be born.
But it never happened.
Because—
Texas. So you were just Texas after all.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Of course I'm just Texas.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Looks like I'm just Lappland.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland extends a hand to Texas.
Texas takes the hand.
Texas, am I your friend, or your enemy?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're my friend, and my enemy.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then go.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Let me do what a friend should.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas nods to the others, and walks towards Grey Hall.
It is all so natural, as though it was always the way things should be.
When Lavinia walks into the church and sees the body sitting silently on the pew, she finally accepts the truth—
Bernardo is dead.
She sits by the man who was both father and brother, the man who had such an impact on her life, and stays silent.
In the end, she says nothing.
But she holds Bernardo's lifeless hand, as though communicating something, or getting something from him.
Then, she turns and leaves.
The dead are dead and gone. She must move on.
I heard my friends talking about what you did.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Let me ask you one thing, child.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: All the nations across these lands are seeking change, trying to move with the times.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: But the impetus for change is an awareness of inadequacy, or a search for breakthrough.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Does Siracusa need that? Does Siracusa really need to change?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Do you think... that the famiglia is something that must exist?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Nothing is. But it existed for centuries before I was born.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: We can't deny our history, or so easily destroy what already exists, can we?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: That's why you chose to continue the famiglia system when you established Grey Hall, except now all the famiglie have to operate under your control.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't intend to deny it.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In fact, I think it was the correct decision, in its time.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But things are different now?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The return of the Columbian famiglie brought advanced technology and philosophy.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The Columbians are exerting an increasing influence on famiglia-style rule, but many haven't realized it.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Some of what my father did was overly radical.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Our motivations are different, and so are our means.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But one thing is the same.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We both believe that—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Siracusa doesn't need the famiglie anymore.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What are you planning to do, then?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: The simplest thing would be to kill you here, or die trying.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But that's the choice my father would have made.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As for me...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I would like to borrow a city.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: An interesting proposal.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: A new city needs new blood.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: But you're on your own, child.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: How am I supposed to believe that you can reach your goal?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: The doors of Grey Hall are pushed open, before Signora Sicilia finished her sentence.
Hm?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Cellinia. The last Texas.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Come here and let me get a good look at you.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I see your grandfather in you.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Looks like Giovanna has given you the necklace that I gave her.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: What is it you want?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: If you want to go back to Lungmen, I guarantee that Siracusa will never disturb you again.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I want to ask you to spare Famiglia Rossati.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh? That's a surprise.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Wallach assassinated Giovanna, and tried to kill you many times.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Do you really want to spare him?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: They're only trying to survive, in their own way.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You can keep the necklace. I never intended to do anything to them.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Or, you can trade it for the right to leave Siracusa forever.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Texas sits down by Leontuzzo's side.
Don't need that. I'm extending my vacation.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What about you, Lappland?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Lone wolf, Saluzzo's traitor.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Lappland walks to Texas's side with a jesting smirk on her face.
Heh. I got a simple dream.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I wanna destroy Siracusa, just like them.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The difference is that I'm not as civilized.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And you, Judge Lavinia, instrument of my will?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Lavinia stands behind Leontuzzo.
Your will was once Siracusa itself.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But now, I'm going to change it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You believe that I'm wrong?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: I believe that no one can be right forever.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signora Sicilia casts her gaze at the four young people before her.
One who came from the strongest famiglia in Siracusa, whose upbringing made him long for a civilized future. Denied by his position, he chose to bury his head in the sand.
One who came from modest beginnings, who earned the favor of the famiglie. It filled her with doubt about herself, and so she chose to deceive herself.
One who came from the oldest famiglia in Siracusa, who hated everything that it asked of her. It drove her to rebellion, down a path of madness.
One who came from the strongest famiglia in Columbia, who became exhausted with the existence of the famiglia itself. She chose to run away in silence.
They want to change Siracusa for different reasons, but they all came together, in the end.
I won't live forever, but I have a few decades left.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Until the moment that my eyes close forever, Siracusa will continue to enjoy the peace that I bring.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: What about you, child?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: You stand on your father's shoulders, seeking to make the system better and fairer.
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: Do you think you chose the correct path?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: If I gave you Siracusa, could you guarantee that she would walk a better path, and become a better country?
attributes.name: Signora Sicilia

attributes.content: ...I can't guarantee that.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, just as you're willing to listen to me here today...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If someone else comes along, looking to change my ways...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm willing to sit down and hear him out.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Signora Sicilia smiles.
You see, I don't hear any fighting. They're fine.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You're the only one who could be so at ease like this. That's the head of state there, you know?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sorry for making you worry.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh? Where's Lappland?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas casts her gaze in a certain direction.
She's fulfilled her duty as a friend. Who knows what form she'll take, when she shows herself next time?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The only thing I can be sure is this.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We haven't seen the last of her.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: My head hurts just thinkin' about it.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Never mind. Let's see how Giovanna's doing.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Giovanna, we're back!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The room is empty.
Sora's joy quickly turns to confusion.
Then, she sees a stack of paper on the desk.
It is a script.
Sora flips over the first page.
'Dedicated to my dear old friend, Cellinia.
And my new friends, Penguin Logistics.'
The part that Giovanna was struggling with in Act 3 of La Morte di Texas...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Is this what you left for us?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You didn't have to leave.
attributes.name: Sora
